properties.areaDesc: San Bernardino County Mountains; Apple and Lucerne Valleys
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 9:59PM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
...GUSTY SOUTHWEST TO WEST WINDS IN THE MOUNTAINS AND DESERTS
THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING...

.A storm system moving through Southern California Thursday into
Friday will generate gusty southwest to west winds, mainly along
the mountain crests and desert slopes, portions of the high
desert, and through the San Gorgonio Pass.

* WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to
55 mph expected.

* WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Apple and Lucerne
Valleys. Strongest winds along the crests and desert slopes of
the San Bernardino Mountains.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 4 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down. Blowing dust could reduce
visibility in the desert at times Thursday afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel may become hazardous for high
profile vehicles traveling along I-15 and Highways 247, 18,
and 395 in the high desert.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY
